VIP_Instruction:
What to do for permanent VIP

1) Copy your logined email account
2) Then copy your Secure Id from profile
NOTE :
Secure Id is also known as Android Id of your phone and it is only Unique to your phone. Please note Modder Hub can be login upto 2 devices simultaneously. It is only possible if you share two different Secure id from your App profile to us during verification.
And also you have to remember that the factory reset can modify your Android Id meaning Secure ID, and result in losing your account. But don't worry, we are providing 2 free reverification of Secure Id if you followed what Modder Hub says during login.
After completing 2 free modifications of your Secure Id, you have to pay about 1.5$ or ₹70 or 2€ for another 2 free reverifications of your account.
So it's my humble request: do not factory reset your phone unnecessarily, else remember the above statements.
3) Your permanent User Name
This user name can be your official YouTube or Telegram Channel handle name, or your official Website name. If you don't have any official account, you must send your official name with valid proof. Remember, only valid names should be sent for verification. If anything is wrong with the name, we will notify or may not even reply to your email request.

After successfully paying via any method below, you should click the Already Purchased Button for more precise instructions about what to write in email message.

VIP contents of Modder Hub are considered as virtual goods and purchases do not support refund option.
